pages.text: $(thing)Spirit$() is a natural resource that represents the $(o)spiritual energy$() of the body.$(br)Your $(thing)spirit$() generates naturally over time, as well as when attacking enemies.$(br)The lower your health, the faster you will regenerate it, including when attacking.
pages.title: Spirit

pages.text: $(thing)Spirit$() is used by $(l:aoa3:blasters#blasters)blasters$(/l) to fire shots, as well as a handful of other weapons.$(br)Some creatures will drain your $(thing)spirit$() on contact, so keep a close eye on your $(thing)spirit$() levels if you intend to use it.
Visit the official $(aoa) wiki page for more information.
pages.title: AoA Wiki
